titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Nall and Williams Tobacco Co. records, 1892-1911, 1920 RL.11068
titlestmt.author: Alice Poffinberger

publicationstmt.publisher: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2015-10-28 15:49:00 -0400.

repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

did.unittitle: Nall and Williams Tobacco Co. records
did.abstract: Collection comprises three volumes containing company records. One volume (31 pages) contains minutes of meetings of the board of directors, 1903-1911, with one set of minutes is pasted-in. Another volume contains stock certificates, 1892-1911, 1920; the report for 1920 is pasted-in. There is also a record book that holds copies of the articles of incorporation (1891), the bylaws, stockholder meeting minutes (1892-1911), and director's meeting minutes (1892-1902); includes one set of 1903 minutes pasted-in.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Nall and Williams Tobacco Co. was founded in Louisville, Kentucky in 1891. It eventually was controlled by Liggett & Myers following the Sherman Antitrust Act in 1911.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.
All or portions of this collection may be housed off-site in Duke University's Library Service Center. The library may require up to 48 hours to retrieve these materials for research use.
Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The Nall and Williams Tobacco Co. records were received by the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library as a gift in 2015.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Nall and Williams Tobacco Co. records, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Accessions described in this collection guide: 2015-0120.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Collection comprises three volumes containing company records. One volume (31 pages) contains minutes of meetings of the board of directors, 1903-1911, with one set of minutes is pasted-in. Another volume contains stock certificates, 1892-1911, 1920; the report for 1920 is pasted-in. There is also a record book that holds copies of the articles of incorporation (1891), the bylaws, stockholder meeting minutes (1892-1911), and director's meeting minutes (1892-1902); includes one set of 1903 minutes pasted-in.
